video.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
video.synopsis: The lives of an uneducated merchant, his high-maintenance family and their neighbors unfold in a melting pot community in Mumbai known as Gokuldham.

episodes.synopsis: An uneducated businessman finds a friend and guru in his neighbor, who he needs to deal with his simpleton wife, impish son and capricious father.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The Tapu Sena feel their love for sports is not supported; Atmaraam Bhide makes a discovery about Madhvi; Bhide is concerned about Gokuldham's future.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: When Jethalal falls into a flirtatious mood, Babita becomes the center of his attention; Tapu finds brand new ways to frustrate his father.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Jethalal comes up with a scheme to turn his shop into a huge attraction; Tapu hatches a plan to undermine Daya's intended punishment.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: A misunderstanding with the police brings Jethalal under investigation, and his responses to their interrogation only makes matters worse.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Jethalal goes to pick up his father at the railway station but gets distracted; Tapu finds his own way of celebrating his grandfather's arrival.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: After overdoing it at a celebration that has everyone dancing with joy, Champaklal Gada suffers from a broken back.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Jethalal's proves his concern for his ailing father when he hears news of a heavy rainfall; Anjali shares shocking news with Daya.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The Tapu Sena receives praise for their bravery; Jethalal is drawn into the fray when Bhide gets disgusted with Champaklal.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: A chase to find the lost Champaklal Gada begins, and the Gada family blames the Bhide family for all their woes; Jethalal's apology backfires.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: When Champaklal Gada receives a new phone, she struggles to understand how it functions, and whether  technology and spirituality go hand-in-hand.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: When the kids get excited about the upcoming festival, they start celebrating by teasing Sonu. Both Tapu and Bhide try to solve her problem.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Daya is thrilled about the upcoming celebrations of Rakshabandhan, but Jethalal only feels irritated toward her.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Daya keeps calling Jethalal at work and disturbing him. On the job, he spots a large sum of cash, but as he goes to grab it, someone kidnaps him.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Jethalal's kidnappers learn of the police visit to Gokuldham; Daya prays as Champaklal and Tarak Mehta negotiate, and Tapu takes hostages of his own.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Jethalal plans to play poker with his friends on Janamashtmi but knows he will meet resistance. Tarak Mehta gives him advice.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: When Daya and her married friends grow disgusted with the actions of their husbands, Champak Chacha gets into the act and helps the women.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: When Tapu learns that he faces expulsion unless his father meets with the school principal the next day, the worried boy seeks Abdul's help.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Bhide confronts Jethalal with complaints against his father and his son; Jethalal fears dire consequences if he cannot fix his family's flippant ways.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: When Jethalal realizes that he has become a "yes man," he worries about the impact it will have on Tapu, who is happy to exploit the situation.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: On the occasion of Ganesh Utsav, all the females of the society, led by Anjali and Daya, decide to fast in order to improve their married lives.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: When the men who are fasting for the holiday seem happy and do not complain of hunger, their wives begin to wonder what they are really up to.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Champaklal, Tapu and the gang try to collect donations for the occasion of Ganesh Utsav, but no one in the society appears willing to give.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: When Champak Chacha goes missing, Daya goes into a panic. As the family searches frantically for her, Jethalal lands himself in trouble.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: A bomb scare during the Ganesh Utsav celebration creates a frenzy. To make matters worse, a reporter crashes the party hoping to get a scoop.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: As the holiday concludes, everyone is in the mood to pray, but when the women eavesdrop on the men's confessions, Daya hears a shocking revelation.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Knowing that Daya is listening, Jethalal lies about how much he loves and admires her. Daya's ecstasy at this news makes the other women jealous.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: A poetry convention begins, and Jethalal is eager to hear Bhide's verses -- but it turns out the community is rich with wordsmiths.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Daya's entry in the poetry competition reveals startling things about her husband. A winner emerges as the festival draws to its emotional conclusion.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Tarak feels conflicted after a surprise chat with a college chum; Jethalal feels obliged to wear an embarrassing T-shirt Sunder gave him as a gift.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: The men share tales of their marital woes; Jethalal gets mad at Daya for watching soap operas and threatens to take away the TV.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: The men read a book on marriage written by Tarak's friend, Gobhachari, and while Jethalal stands proud, Sodhi and Bhide must face consequences.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Gobachari inspires the husbands to create a list of demands from their wives, which results in an all-out war of the sexes and much embarrassment.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: The fight between the husbands and wives takes a turn when the women enforce their own doctrine and a hidden truth about Gobhachari is revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Jethalal worries about Tapu's obsession with television and decides that TV is to blame for all of his son's burgeoning problems.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: As TV becomes an instrument of division between the parents and children of the society, Jethalal makes a plan for how he will deal with it at home.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Jethalal activates the child lock on his TV so his son can only view the spiritual channel, but Tapu schemes to get his daily dose of cable.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: When Tapu and his friends decide they no longer want to wear clothes, everyone's hopes rest on Champaklal to save the day.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: When the festival of Navratri approaches, everyone wants to play a traditional game, and Daya is excited to take responsibility for its success.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: When Daya wants to go to Ahmedabad and celebrate Navratri at her mother's place, Jethalal does everything in his power to evade her plan.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: When the Gada clan decides to go to Ahemdabad for Navratri, the decision creates a wave of mixed  emotions among the members of their society.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Champaklal catches Jethalal in a ruse to spend time with Babita; hooligans crash the society's celebration of Navratri and harass Babita.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: When Bhide and Sodhi confront thugs who disrupted their celebration, they are threatened at gunpoint, but Tapu hatches a plan to save the elders.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Gokuldham society members enter a dance contest, but Daya manages to step on Jethalal's toes when she mistakenly insults him in public.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Taarak resists Anjali's efforts to get him to see a doctor; Jethalal finds frustrations with Daya's cooking, his father's lectures and Sodhi's humor.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Jethalal promises the sheikh he will arrange to get a kidney for his brother and tries to bribe Natu Kaka and Abdul into donating their organs.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Jethalal prays to God for help finding a kidney donor, and when Sodhi appears in the garden, he thinks he may have found the answer to his problem.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Tense and angry, Jethalal is not himself, so Daya sends him to the doctor's office, where he meets a patient who might hold the cure for his ills.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Daya's father-in-law tries to convince Badri Nath not to sell his kidney, while Jethalal parties with the Sheikh, unaware of the turn of events.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: As society members prepare for the festival of Diwali, Tapu enrages his father by setting off firecrackers, and Jethalal is mistaken for a servant.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: When Bhide takes a picture of Jethalal cleaning his house, Jethalal worries that Bhide will show that photo to the society members and humiliate him.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Daya shows off a new necklace; Jethalal and Daya each get a scolding; Bhide gets miffed when the parents of his students refuse to pay his fees.
episodes.title: Episode 52
